column2: Relocate the Capital

The three core cities of the Great Lakes Oligarchy are vying to host the formal seat of the goverment. Previously, Milwaukee has been used as an informal meeting location. As the GLO has developed, it is now time to develop a lasting capital.
We will choose Chicago, the administrative hub of the nation.
We will choose Milwaukee, the cultural hub of the nation.
We will choose Detroit, the industrial hub of the nation.
The Great Lakes Oligarchy Demands Toledo!
The Great Lakes Oligarchy has threatened war if we do not secede what they believe are their rightful lands of the Toldeo Strip.
Our armies are no match for theirs, we must accept.
Perhaps we can offer them Cedar Point as a compromise.
They will never take Toledo from us!
Sandusky Accepts Our Demand!
The people of Sandusky have accepted our demands out of fear of our mighty armies.
The Cedar Point Compromise

The people of Sandusky have offered us a compromise: they keep the Toledo strip in exchange for us gaining ownership of the valuable amusement park of Cedar Point. Cedar Point offers family fun for all ages at reasonable prices. Come try the new Gyroscopic Grinder ride today!
This is a worthy proposal, load the minivan immediately.
Going to an amusement park when there is work to do? This is a terrible deal!
Sandusky Denies Our Demand!
The people of Sandusky had the gall to deny our demands - they must pay!
Henry Ford Emerges from Hiding

Following his escape from arrest in 1875, innovator Henry Ford has revealed himself to the public toting a show of inventions, contraptions, and other excitements. He proposes revolutionary methods to boost our nation's factory production, yet may someday challenge a threat to our government's economic control over its people. Should we let him remain in our country as a free man?
He is a valuable asset to our country and will do wonders for production.
His large following is a threat to our power, we must sieze his assets and execute him.
The Dearborn Independent

The Jewish question, as every businessman knows, has been festering in silence and suspcion here in the Great Lakes Oligarchy for a long time, and none has dared discuss it because the Jewish influence was strong enough to crush the man who attempted it. The Jews are the only race whom it is 'verboten' to discuss frankly and openly, and abusing the fear they have cast over business, the Jewish leaders have gone from one excess of the other until the time has come for a protest or a surrender.
I hope Ford's ideology doesn't pose any threat to the status-quo.
The Search for the Big One

For centuries, the people of the Baja region have searched for the mythical Big One - a wave that will deliver the rider to the throne of Neptune himself. Many a barney has been lost at sea in pursuit of the fabled wave, and none has yet to lay eyes on its majestic curl. Perhaps, for a sizeable portion of our state budget, we could organize an excursion lead by professionals in order to finally discover this wave.
We will allocate the most funding possible.
We will allocate a reasonable amount of funding.
We will allocate only a small amount of funding.
Galapagos Islands Discovered!

While searching the open seas for the perfect wave, our explorers have accidentially stumbled across an island chain. Although we assume the island is not valuable to us, we have planted our flag in the name of the Net Surfers.
Marquesas Islands Discovered!

While searching the open seas for the perfect wave, our explorers have accidentially stumbled across an island chain. Although we assume the island is not valuable to us, we have planted our flag in the name of the Net Surfers.
Hawaii Discovered!

While searching the open seas for the perfect wave, our explorers have accidentially stumbled across an island chain. Although we assume the island is not valuable to us, we have planted our flag in the name of the Net Surfers.
Ride the Big One

Today we feast on the fruits of our labor. The men lost, boards broken, and years of youth stolen from us have not been in vain. The wave is approaching us now, curl stretching up towards the heavens, inviting us to carve the glassy wave up to the heavens. Today, men will become gods on Earth as we at last will ride the Big One.
Cowabunga dude!
Surfers have claimed the Galapagos Islands!
Voyagers have stumbled upon one of our colonies and proclaimed it to be their new lands. When asked to leave they just said "cowabunga dude" and cracked a beer.
We must retake our lands from these beatniks.
Surfers have claimed the Marquesas Islands!
Voyagers have stumbled upon one of our colonies and proclaimed it to be their new lands. When asked to leave they just said "cowabunga dude" and cracked a beer.
We must retake our lands from these beatniks.
Surfers have claimed Hawaii!
Voyagers have stumbled upon one of our colonies and proclaimed it to be their new lands. When asked to leave they just said "cowabunga dude" and cracked a beer.
We must retake our lands from these beatniks.
